Text:
Yes, R.I.P. Elisabeth Sladen - best companion ever!

If anyone is looking for Seasons 1-3, here you go:
https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6182130/The_Sarah_Jane_Adventures_-_Seasons_1_2_and_3_%5BHDTV%5D

XXX to the one and only Dr Who Companion who changed my life, and again in The Sarah Jane Adventures.
May you Rest In Peace beautiful lady of the stars.
